Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

RequestGroup.Name: RequestGroup
RequestGroup.Description: An instance of the R4 RequestGroup FHIR resource.

author.Name: author
author.Description: The user who created the dental visit.

authoredOn.Name: authoredOn
authoredOn.Description: The instant the dental visit was created.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: The encounter for the dental visit.

extension.Name: extension
extension.Description:
The following optional extensions are supported at the root level for this resource:
  • dental-visit-number: The relative order of the visit within the treatment.
  • dental-visit-name: The name of the visit
  • dental-visit-scheduling-status: The scheduling status of the visit
  • dental-visit-requested-length: The requested appointment length for the visit
  • dental-visit-requested-spacing-days:
  • dental-visit-scheduling-instructions: The scheduling instructions for the visit
  • dental-visit-requested-date: The date on which the provider requested that the appointment be scheduled.
  • dental-visit-requested-type: The requested visit type for scheduling.
  • dental-visit-requested-department: The requested department for scheduling.
  • dental-visit-requested-provider: The requested visit provider for scheduling
  • dental-visit-requested-provider: The requested provider type for scheduling
  • ready-for-scheduling: Whether the visit is ready for scheduling

intent.Name: intent
intent.Description: The intention for the dental visit.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The status of the dental visit.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient for the dental visit.
